description:
From their office in Twin Falls, Idaho, the attorneys at the Hilverda McRae, PLLC, law firm provide unmatched representation and support to clients throughout Twin Falls County and the surrounding areas who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and medical malpractice
  • Insurance law and bad faith claims
  • Criminal defense
  • Business to business matters
  • Estate planning
  • Civil litigation
  • Commercial litigation

As passion and hard work are the keys to their success, the law firm's attorneys promise to sit with you and fully explain your options to help you make informed decisions. Regardless of the complexity your issues or the goals you wish to achieve, you can turn to them to help you protect your rights and interest at all turns as the firm works diligently to help you achieve the positive results you expect and deserve as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Honored for their outstanding professionalism and service, the firm's attorneys have earned perennial Best Attorney Readers' Choice Awards from the Times News along with many other top rankings and endorsements from their peers. They have also received numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients, and they find great reward in being able to help so many in their community during their most dire times of need.

To find out more about how the firm can best assist you with the legal challenges you face, you can contact Hilverda McRae, PLLC, by calling the office or visiting the website to schedule a free initial consultation. The firm also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe and healthy in these trying times.
